subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Williams defeated Maria Sharapova, setting up a final against Muguruza, 21, of Spain, who beat Agnieszka Radwanska in three sets on Thursday.
snippet: Williams defeated Maria Sharapova, setting up a final against Muguruza, 21, of Spain, who beat Agnieszka Radwanska in three sets on Thursday.
